I'd can take a condition drop or even add some $$$.

Bridwell/no cap, [STRIKE]Criger[/STRIKE], Doughtery, Lajoie, Mathewson, Turner, [STRIKE]Waddell[/STRIKE], [STRIKE]Wiltse/no cap[/STRIKE], Young.
